entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
